propositions.text: The document is titled '重生微醺初夏'.
Section '01' appears to contain metadata or a link.
Section '02' contains a dialogue between two speakers, referred to as '二哥' (Second Brother) and another speaker.
The dialogue starts with a question about a new girl.
One speaker describes the new girl as quiet, gentle, and having good气质 (temperament/aura).
This speaker also mentions that the new girl is very suitable to be his girlfriend.
The second speaker questions this, recalling the first speaker's previous preference for only celebrities.
The first speaker clarifies that his previous statement about celebrities was a casual remark.
The dialogue then focuses on identifying the new girl's name, with the first speaker recalling she might be surnamed '安' (An).
The second speaker confirms the description of the girl (gentle, quiet, good temperament).
There is a repeated exchange where the first speaker repeatedly states that the new girl is '挺好' (quite good) and '最起码比你那个网红女朋友强多了' (at least much better than your internet celebrity girlfriend).
This statement is met with exclamations of '二哥！' (Second Brother!) and '你说错了！' (You're wrong!).
The second speaker is asked for their opinion multiple times, but the dialogue appears to cut off or repeat before a definitive answer is given.
